root.name: Déjà Vu I & II: The Casebooks of Ace Harding
root.description: Overview Déjà Vu I II: The Casebooks of Ace Harding is a 1999 PC and Game Boy Color compilation of Déjà Vu: A Nightmare Comes True and Déjà Vu II: Lost in Las Vegas. Both games are point-and-click adventure titles that put the player in the role of Ace Harding, a hard-boiled detective.
